storyInfo:
On the way, Tomimi explains the local situation to the Doctor.
At the same time, an argument over tails catches Gavial's attention.

attributes.content: Rainforest's same as ever, huh.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's been a really long time, hasn't it, Gavial?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Never liked this place. Air's stifling, and the ground gives too easy. Can't place a single firm step.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: A lot of tribes have moved into the rainforest, though.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: That so? ...Hey, Doctor, looks like you're up. How'd you sleep last night?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You adapt fast, huh, Doctor? Hell, I thought you wouldn't be able to stand roughing it out here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Haha. Your eyes say it all.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yeah, I'd believe you if you weren't trying to rub your temples.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Didn't I tell you, Doctor? Gotta be ready. It's not about to get any easier.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Here. Scrounged up what I could find nearby to make some soup. Go on, it'll wake you up.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, speaking of which. Never realized it until I went looking, but actually, there's a hell of a lot of medicinal plants that grow around this rainforest.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...Gavial's actually taking care of people...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: G... Gavial, I didn't sleep good either...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Huh? And you call yourself an Archosauria?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Archosauria... *wail* Gavial doesn't remember our original name...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hmm? Oh, crap, I did forget. I mean Tiacauh, don't I.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Damn, I don't think I've used that word at all since I left. Doctor, you make a note to yourself. We don't divvy ourselves up by race here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I mean, from that perspective, uh, lemme think... I'm an Archosauria, Zumama's a Phidia, and there's also Liberi... yeah, that's your three, more or less.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But we all count ourselves as Tiacauh. Means 'one valiant in war' in our language.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Also, not that I think you're gonna need it, but you might like to know we call this place Acahualla. 'Land where the forest overgrows.'
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Alright, enough bawling your eyes out. Get your people in gear and let's move.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: (Whimper)
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Rhodes Island. Doctor...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, right. So, a company is...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah, I know that! Since you left, Gavial, I've been learning about the outside world!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh yeah? That adds up. You dress different from how you used to, too, now that I think about it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yep! This is really fashionable on the outside!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I don't really get fashion. Is she right, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: I've seen it in magazines.;......;I have no idea.

attributes.content: Yeah, so the Doctor's seen it too!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Gavial, your friend doesn't seem like a fashion expert either.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Haha. There's something even you don't know, huh.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, Tomimi, how about you introduce the Doctor to our place? I've been away for forever. I don't know what's changed.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sure!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Okay, let me think. What should I tell an outsider...? Right, let's start with the tribes.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Look at this map. Here's where Gavial landed, and here's the path we took.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: This big forested area is our Acahualla.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Traditionally, every tribe of Acahualla, big and small, joins in this ceremony where we choose the next Great Chief.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, and the ceremony a trial by combat. Whoever beats all the other challengers and earns their recognition gets the right to challenge the current Great Chief.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: If they defeat the Great Chief, they become the new one.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Now the power of the Great Chief? Every tribe listens to what she says, for starters!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Sounds like nothing's really changed, then.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Something has!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: One day, the last Great Chieftain Juan drank too much and his wife chased him to the edge of a cliffside. He jumped off it and never came back. Our last ceremony was to pick his successor.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: But some stuff happened with Gavial and we never chose a Great Chief. And ever since Gavial left, none of the tribes have really gotten along with each other.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: So now we've all been stuck fighting each other.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Wuh? That part's actually normal for us.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: My dad said Great Chief Juan was one of the longest Great Chiefs ever. We'd usually get a new one every two or three years.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Whenever we lose a Great Chief's, we do the ceremony to pick a new one.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.options: Now what was that about Gavial?

attributes.content: What? Oh, yeah, I never told anybody at Rhodes Island about that stuff.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I beat every single comer to the whole damn thing and then I left.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Because they ostracized you?;Every single one?!

attributes.content: Yeah. I was pissed. Went and knocked all their lights out.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Anyway, that's another story. Any especially strong tribes running around?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: A bunch of them are pretty powerful now.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: First is the one that Zumama leads, the Eunectes tribe.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: She settled her tribe in another part of the rainforest near a lot of ore veins. She has a hold on most of our metal resources.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: That tribe always liked making weird tools and weapon things. They've absorbed a lot of the small tribes that surrounded them.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Second is Kemar's Flint tribe.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: The rainforest Tiacauh don't live quite the same as the rest of us. They're a lot more scattered. Normally, they don't even communicate with us.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: But because we have no Great Chief, a lot of tribes ended up going into the rainforest.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Kemar's is one of them now.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: They were confident enough in their own power to take a piece of territory for themselves.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: There's one more tribe that's pretty notable. I think you recognize them too, Gavial. Inam's tribe.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Her tribe's called the 'Inam Committee.' The people in it act kind of weird. None of them really like fighting people, but they all like doing business.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: There are a lot of them too. Don't underestimate them.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I can picture it right now. Zumama setting her tribe up next to a mine. Yeah, ever since way back, she's loved making those weapons of hers or whatever.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wouldn't have thought she'd be bossing a clan now, though. 'Eunectes' has a nice ring to it!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yep. Zumama's Eunectes tribe is the strongest one too, now, and everyone thinks she's gonna be the next Chief.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Not surprised. Kid's been pretty capable for a long while.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So, um, Gavial, are you really not gonna be the Great Chief?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Nope. There's stuff on the outside I've gotta do.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Right, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Yes.;......;You can stay if you want.

attributes.content: Stuff on the outside, huh...?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hmm. Is Gavial straightforward, or just cruel...?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hey, there'll be a day when I come back here. But it's not today.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, you said you were gonna go for it in your letter, right? And you were confident, even?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Um, mm-hm!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I trained a lot for it!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Then I'm looking forward to the show!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? Do I hear fighting?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Over that way. Let's go see.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Will you say it or not!?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Like I would!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Keh, you've got backbone.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Oh, hey, they're fighting. Doctor, we can leave 'em. Let's just go. This happens all the time.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're done for, Thin-Tails. I'm gonna make you admit Thick-Tails are where it's at!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yeah, in your dreams! Like I'd ever give in!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey! What's-your-face over there. What did you just say?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Who're you? Don't tell me you're a Thin-Tails too?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Like hell I am. But did I catch that right? You think thick tails are better?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What? Obviously! Take a look at mine! Sturdy! Strong! Plump and plush! What's better than a nice thick tail like this, huh?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Tch. Whelp, can't pretend I didn't hear that shit!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Take a good look at my thin tail here. Slim, refined! Clean, distinct contours! Hell, I can actually grab things with it! Now this is a tail!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I hear that! Thin tails for life! *Cough,* *cough!*
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Huh? You kidding? You can't even see a tail like that behind your ass!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yeah, shout out to yours! I bet your ass loves when it can't sit down 'cause your tail's so fat!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah. Gavial's arguing with that one there about thin versus thick tails.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: It's a pretty common topic for us. You might say the tail is an Archosauria's greatest pride. People compare them. Whole tribes have even formed on how thick or thin their tails are.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I think the one fighting with Gavial might be a Thick-Tails.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Xolopitlipol! Brothers, come out!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Today's the day! We will make it known that thick tails reign supreme!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Oh. That's a lot of people. Um, Doctor, I'm going to help Gavial.
attributes.name: Tomimi
